completion: Machine learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on building systems that learn from data.
Neural networks are computing systems inspired by biological brains. They process information through interconnected nodes organized in layers.
Gradient descent is an optimization algorithm used to minimize a function by iteratively moving in the direction of steepest descent.
Backpropagation is an algorithm for training neural networks by calculating gradients of the loss function with respect to the weights.
Transformers are neural network architectures that use self-attention mechanisms to process sequential data in parallel.
